did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Isle of Wight County Museum Collection of miscellanous ledgers, 1896-1939

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Isle of Wight County Museum Collection of miscellaneous ledgers, 1896-1939. Accession 50200. Business records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Loaned for copying by the Isle of Wight County Museum, Smithfield, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Miscellaneous ledgers, 1896-1939, consisting of the store ledger, 1896-1897, of John L. Cowling (1863-1902), a merchant in Isle of Wight County, Virginia, containing account information; an ledger, 1898-1907, 1935, for an unidentified Isle of Wight County merchant, containing account information; a ledger, 1901-1909, of an unidentified Isle of Wight County merchant listing goods bought for his store and corn sent to a mill; and two ledgers, 1937-1939, for an unidentified Isle of Wight County bank containing account information.
